question: What is the estimated cost of the new Chandrayaan -3 project, as per the announcement of ISRO?
explanation: The Indian Space Research Organisation has recently confirmed the countryâ€™s third mission to the moon, named Chandrayaan-3. The Government has approved the project of Chandrayaan-3 and the estimated cost of the project would be more than Rs.600 Crores as announced by the Chairman of ISRO, K Sivan. As per his statement, the new soft-landing mission project is expected to be launched at the end of this year or during early 2021.
